titles.title: Government Shutdown Efficiency Act
Government Shutdown Efficiency Act
To provide the President the authority to sell Federal real property during a lapse in appropriations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Government Reform, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
